generated_text:
- road: The image shows a paved road with lane markings extending into the distance, flanked by sidewalks and buildings.
- sidewalk: There are clearly defined sidewalks on both sides of the road, with bicycles parked along the left side and construction barriers on the right.
- building: Multiple buildings line both sides of the street, including residential and commercial structures with windows and storefronts.
- fence: Red and white striped barriers are visible on the right side of the road, acting as temporary fences for construction.
- pole: Several poles are visible, including those supporting overhead wires for the tram and traffic signs.
- traffic light: A traffic light is visible in the distance, mounted on a pole.
- traffic sign: Various traffic signs are visible, including a "No Entry" sign and others mounted on poles along the street.
- vegetation: Trees are visible in the background, lining the street and providing some greenery.
- sky: The sky is visible in the background, appearing clear and blue.
- person: A person is visible standing near the tram stop on the left side of the street.
- car: Several cars are parked along the right side of the street, including a red car and a black car.
- bus: A tram (a type of train) is visible on the left side of the street, stopped at a tram stop.
- motorcycle: A motorcycle is parked on the left side of the street, near the bicycles.
- bicycle: Several bicycles are parked along the left side of the street, next to the tram stop.
